resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/77428</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>77428</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>ab0282c6-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A hajók fejlődése az ókortól a 16. század derekáig</string>
            <string language="en">the development of the ships from the antiquity till the middle of the 16. century</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">die Entwicklung der Schiffe vom Altertum bebauen 
die Mitte des Jahrhunderts 16.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le développement des bateaux de l'antiquité 
labourent le milieu du siècle 16.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o desenvolvimento dos navios do antiquity till o 
meio do século 16.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lo sviluppo delle navi dall'antichità lavorare 
la metà del secolo 16.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">η ανάπτυξη των σκαφών από την αρχαιότητα μέχρι τα 
μέσα του αιώνα 16,</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el desarrollo de las naves de la antigüedad 
labra el centro del siglo 16.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A hajótípusok neveinek, évszámainak és képeinek párosítása leírás segítségével.</string>
            <string language="en">The matching of the names, dates and pictures of the ship types, with the help of description</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">hajózás,  karavella,  karakk,  galeon,  kogge,  </string>
            <string language="en">sailing, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Zusammenbringen der Namen, der Daten und der 
Abbildungen der Schiff Typen, mit Hilfe der Beschreibung</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Apparier des noms, des dates et des images des 
types de bateau, avec l'aide de la description</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Combinar dos nomes, das datas e dos retratos dos 
tipos do navio, com a ajuda da descrição</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Corrispondenza dei nomi, delle date e delle 
immagini dei tipi della nave, con l'aiuto della descrizione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το ταίριασμα των ονομάτων, των ημερομηνιών και των 
εικόνων των τύπων σκαφών, με τη βοήθεια της περιγραφής</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El corresponder con de los nombres, de las fechas
y de los cuadros de los tipos de la nave, con la ayuda de la 
descripción</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Segeln, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">navigation, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sailing, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">navigazione, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ναυσιπλοϊ'α, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">navegación, caravella, karakk, galeon, kogge</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>590</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>77428</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=ab0282c6-12a2-11d8-9145-d64dc9453a34&v=1&b=2</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
